path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Belaunch Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Round up time_pass cause to always revert when calculate vesting amount
findings.description: The function calculate_vesting_amount has a precision loss issue due to incorrect rounding of time_pass variable, causing it to always revert.

findings.title: User can join sale before fundraiser update whitelist
findings.description: The fundraiser's whitelist has not been updated, allowing users to join a sale prematurely.

findings.title: A03.Wrong timestamp unit
findings.description: Using incorrect timestamp units can cause unexpected behavior.

findings.title: sale_type must be less than or equal 2
findings.description: It is recommended to add assertion: assert! (sale_type <= 2 , EWRONG_SALE_TYPE);

findings.title: A05.The variable name is incorrect
findings.description: The variable 'is_whitelist' has an incorrect name.
